title: This is no time for romance
brief_description: Idle hours at a summer cottage, when her husband is at work and the children busy at play, give a wife time to dream a little and reflect on her life and her marriage. Is it enough? What else might she have made of herself? But then her husband returns and she opts for things as they are. A relaxed drama that has much of the mood of a summer outdoors. Cast includes Marc Favreau and Monique Mercure. (Awards: Tours; Toronto.)
